rewrite1: Please take the selected text and modify it as follows: switch the highlight to a maroon shade, make the text bold, adjust the space following each paragraph to 1 centimeter, switch the font to Microsoft YaHei, add an underline, and set the font size to 10.5 points.
rewrite2: Please take the selected text and modify it as follows: Add a maroon highlight, make the text bold, adjust the paragraph spacing to follow at 1 cm, switch the font to Microsoft YaHei, underline the text, and finally, set the font size to 10.5 points.
rewrite3: Select the desired text, then proceed by updating the highlight to a maroon shade. Ensure the text is emboldened and adjust the space following each paragraph to a dimension of 1 centimeter. Change the typeface to Microsoft YaHei, underscore the text, and finally, modify the font size to 10.5 points.
